Actions.Name: Create new child topic
Actions.Description: A new topic is created as a child of the referenced topic.

Actions.Name: Create a new topic
Actions.Description: A new topic is created as a sibling after the referenced topic.

Actions.Name: Delete relation from topic
Actions.Description: Deletes the relation by topic id and relationId.

Actions.Name: Delete a topic
Actions.Description: The specific topic requested by the topic id is deleted.

Actions.Name: Get field from topic
Actions.Description: Get a specific field by field and fieldset identifier for a specific topic.

Actions.Name: Get the path of the supplied topic id to the root
Actions.Description: Get the all topics in the path to the root topic.

Actions.Name: Get a collection of topics
Actions.Description: Get the relationship categories of the topic

Actions.Name: Get Topic
Actions.Description: Get a specific topic by the DCV indentifier.

Actions.Name: Get the Charts of the topic
Actions.Description: From a specific topic requested with the topic id, a collection of charts is returned.

Actions.Name: Get the children af a topic
Actions.Description: Get the children topics of the topic

Actions.Name: Get the fields from topic
Actions.Description: From a specific topic requested with the topic id, a collection of fields is returned.

Actions.Name: Get availible icons for a topic type
Actions.Description: Get a collection of icons for a specific topic type.

Actions.Name: Get the Relations of the topic
Actions.Description: Get the Relations of the topic supplied by topic DCV ID.

Actions.Name: Get the root topic
Actions.Description: Get the root topic.

Actions.Name: Get the sibling topics of the topic
Actions.Description: Get the siblings topics of the topic supplied by the topic id.

Actions.Name: Get types for a topic
Actions.Description: Get a collection of types for an specific topic supplied by the topic id.

Actions.Name: Move a topic down in the branch
Actions.Description: Move a specific topic one place down in the branch.

Actions.Name: Move a topic down in the branch
Actions.Description: Move a specific topic one place down in the branch.

Actions.Name: Move a topic up in the branch
Actions.Description: Move a specific topic one place up in the branch.

Actions.Name: Move a topic up in the branch
Actions.Description: Move a specific topic one place up in the branch.

Actions.Name: Move a topic to the bottom of the branch
Actions.Description: Move a specific topic to the bottom of the branch.

Actions.Name: Move a topic to the top of the branch
Actions.Description: Move a specific topic to the top of the branch.

Actions.Name: Create relation
Actions.Description: Creates a relation between two topics.

Actions.Name: Update boolean field from topic
Actions.Description: Updates a specific boolean field by field and fieldset identifier for a specific topic.

Actions.Name: Update multi value date field from topic
Actions.Description: Updates a specific multi value date field by field and fieldset identifier for a specific topic.

Actions.Name: Update date field from topic
Actions.Description: Updates a specific single value date field by field and fieldset identifier for a specific topic.

Actions.Description: Updates a specific multi value decimal field by field and fieldset identifier for a specific topic.

Actions.Description: Updates a specific single value decimal field by field and fieldset identifier for a specific topic.

Actions.Name: Updates the fields from topic
Actions.Description: Updates multiple types of fields for a specific topic.

Actions.Name: Update list field from topic
Actions.Description: Updates a specific list field by field and fieldset identifier for a specific topic.

Actions.Name: Updates a multivalue hyperlink field
Actions.Description: Updates a multi value hyperlink field for a specific topic.

Actions.Name: Update multivalue number field from topic
Actions.Description: Updates a specific boolean field by field and fieldset identifier for a specific topic.

Actions.Name: Update number field from topic
Actions.Description: Updates a specific single value number field by field and fieldset identifier for a specific topic.

Actions.Name: Update relationshiplist field from topic
Actions.Description: Updates a specific single value relationshiplist field by field and fieldset identifier for a specific topic.

Actions.Name: Update multi value relationship field from topic
Actions.Description: Updates a specific multi value relationship field by field and fieldset identifier for a specific topic.

Actions.Description: Updates a specific single value relationship field by field and fieldset identifier for a specific topic.

Actions.Description: Updates a single value hyperlink field for a specific topic.

Actions.Description: Updates the name of a specific topic.
